ai-ja130:1.2_0: Seeing the danger in sensual pleasures,
ai-ja130:1.3_0: have no agreement on both counts.
ai-ja130:1.4_0: Yet you see when you’re drunk.”
ai-ja130:2.2_0: like a pearl, a wooden star,
ai-ja130:4.3_0: Then to the Bāhiya of the Bark Robe
